description: The young Bronze Saints are taken by Bear Geki to the Hell Camp, which is full of lethal traps composed of the elements of Cosmo. Those who survive the Camp are elligible to become Silver Saints. Kouga and Souma must work together to overcome the obstacles, all while Souma must avoid fellow Saint Argo`s hostility and haunting memories of his past.

titles.title: Concours d`entrée. La course de l`enfer !
Selection Test! Challenge in The Camp of Death!
Senbatsu Shiken! Kesshi no Camp ni Idome!
選抜試験! 決死のキャンプに挑め!
